title: PBE For OCE
body:
Will there ever be a pbe for the people in the Oceanic part because some of us want to try the pbe and help the game but if we try to connect to the NA servers we are always lagging and cant do anything. 
                              Please Make A PBE For OCE

replies.body:
Hey there,

PBE signup is currently only available for users of EUW, EUNE and NA.

You'd need to create an NA, EUW or EUNE account and level that to be eligible for PBE access.

I wouldn't be able to tell you if/when we would be able to sign up for a PBE account under our OCE accounts, however I can confirm that the PBE server would continue to be located in NA.
If I try to even play a game on the the NA servers the ping always goes over 1000ms. So thats why I asked if there would ever be a PBE on OCE servers because alot of people probably want it.
